name: Tank Empty
description:
This is my entry for the Ludum Dare 39 Compo, following the theme "Rumming out of Power".

It was made in about 6 hours using GameMaker Studio 1.4 (I know I have more time, but life gets in the way, so this will have to do).
The code is rather messy, given it was written in a rush - apologies for those who decide to check it out. Still, if you're interested, check it out on GitHub.
